page.title: 02A Visit to my Gran
page.content: {The Headland H/Pool By Chris Roose } When I wentto visit my Gran she showed me pictures of my Grandad who is now dead.She showed me several pictures of my Aunty dancing.She also showed me 3 scrolls of events that happened around 1898-1932.She has a copy of the H/pool Mail,our local daily,dating from 1977-that year the{Queen came to visit {H/pool.}She showed me pictures from one of the{Headland Carnivals,}which my mam was in,and also pictures of my mam and dad's wedding.Sometimes my Gran goes to the bowling green on Friar Terrace where she sits on the benches and watches the people playing bowls.On Sundays she goes to church and comes to our house for dinner.The next Sunday she goes to my Aunty's. Sometimes she goes to the cemetery on Sundays because that is where my Grandad is buried.
